report.title: Not As Strong As People Think
report.author: marklar
report.bodytext:
1100mg of DOB-Dragonfly was dissolved in 1ml of ethanol that was then poured into 21mls of distilled water. This allowed each ml of liquid to contain 50 micrograms of the substance. /n /n The equivalent of 750micrograms was taken at 4:10pm. Here's what happened. /n /n Nothing. /n /n Here's what happened in detail: /n /n T+3 hours. Something feels different, but I'm not sure what. /n /n T+6 hours. Is anything going to happen? I'm not even thinking in a tripped out way. It's just normal me. Should I take the last bit in the vain hope that it will make me trip out? Or will it just keep me in this boring state for a longer? I decided against taking the rest. /n /n T+8 hours I watch tales from the trip side. Its as bad as this trip. But it makes me want some 2c-t-special-G. Am I tripping? Nope. How do I feel? I'm dreading the next few hours when TV turns into infomercials and bible shows. And to top it off my girlfriend has a friend over so I can't do anything else other than lay in bed. I feel just like when I've had some meth and the fun has worn off and all I want is to sleep. Let me sleep damn you drug! ARGGH /n /n T+14 hours I think I fell asleep. /n /n T+24 hours. I definitely fell asleep. Slight headache. Other than that, I feel ok. Can I remember last night? Every boring detail. /n /n In short, 750micrograms was not enough to do anything noticable to me, but it did keep me awake and extremely bored. /n /n I'd like to up the dosage /n as I heard 800micrograms is the active dose, /n
but this is such a rare chem, that I doubt I will get the chance again...
